caption.p: Verification of DEGs by qRT-PCR. The qRT-PCR results showed the same relative regulation of DEGs as the RNA-seq data. qRT-PCR analysis of the expression profiles of selected genes in CA04- and PR8-infected A549 or 293T cells relative to uninfected controls (A, C, E G), A549 cells were infected with CA04 virus. B, D, F, H, 293T cells were infected with PR8 virus). The fold difference was determined using the 2 –DDCt method and RNA levels were normalized to β-actin. Data are presented as the mean ± standard deviation (SD) ( n = 3, ∗ p < 0.05).
